title: How would this be settled in the new Report system?
body:
I was recently playing a game as {{champion:236}}  and lost lane  my support then blamed me for feeding them then decided too leave my lane and leave me to face off against the fed vayne, at the 30 min mark I was being abused by my entire team for feeding on purpose  they all then claimed they would report me for "Feeding" even though during that game I was Abused by  my team mates. I then submitted a report against my sup for being toxic.

So in short what will happen ?

replies.body:
You mean what will happen when people report you for feeding but you were just having a tough game?

You won't be punished for this. The system will sort out false reports. 

What's causing the confusion is the idea that losing lane is the same thing as feeding. Losing lane happens to all of us, intentionally feeding the enemy to throw the game is what the system looks for.
Thanks for the reply, Also the report system is sounding pretty great
